Html:
Hello PHPExcel community,

i have a excel file with a column there the article names are listed. This file I would like to convert in .csv with PHPExcel.
Example:
Collum,H.; Jull:Suiten 1-3
Collum,H.; Jull:Suiten 4-6

My problem is the semicolon ( ; ) in the article name, because the seperator for the csv is a semicolon, too.

How I can replace this semicolon automatic with a slash ( / ) ?

I hope someone can help me.
Thanks a lot,
MichaPHP
